data.text: @SunainaHoley @adarpoonawalla @MoHFW_INDIA @santoshkhatte @SanghiPablo1 @PuneriKul1 @SHIVRAMVAIDYA Physician told to take, and as told he took. Called so many doctors but some are saying it is ok and some denied.. confused..!
@saurabh_khangar @adarpoonawalla @MoHFW_INDIA @santoshkhatte @SanghiPablo1 @PuneriKul1 @SHIVRAMVAIDYA Please see a doctor. Don't take any medicines on your own. Also get him tested.

@NinadRPawar @SanghiPablo1 @adarpoonawalla @SunainaHoley @MoHFW_INDIA @santoshkhatte @PuneriKul1 @SHIVRAMVAIDYA They only told to take the antibiotic.. Looking at FIL’s condition we are getting worried.
